body:
Whether it's reaching 10,000 kills or getting a certain amount of objectives we all have goals on this server.

Personally, I'm aiming to get a 3.0 K/D.

What's your goal?

title: What are your goals on the Avicus Network?

I've got a few :3

  • Never let Sunrise kill me more than I've killed him. 
  • Highest Neb Prestige.
  • Have my clan place in the final four for the future tourney.

replies.body:
Hey 7788james, if you wish to become staff on the Avicus Network, you should definitely try to apply at the Staff Applications section when it is open. 
Currently it is closed and you cannot apply, but when it is open, read the steps of applying to become a Jr. Mod and then go for it! ^_^
